      • CertificateIssuer

        public CertificateIssuer(java.lang.String name,
                         java.security.cert.X509Certificate certificates)
                  throws java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException,
                         java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        generate certificate issuer
        Parameters:
        name - name of issuer (as appeared in DN or a part of DN)
        fileaddress - address of CA cert file
        certificate - X509Certificate of the issuer
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
